name: Robot Ruckus (fitzpaid)
description:
This is an old game, that was created in less than 48 hours for a Game Jam by two novices in hopes of learning more about Unity. Originally hosted heyyoustudios.com it's been moved to itch.io as Wordpress can no longer support the unity plugin needed to play. Due to the deprecation of npapi on Chrome this game will need to be played on another browser like Firefox of Safari.

Controls:

WASD to Move.

Aim with your Mouse.

Left Click for Fire.

1 or 2 to swap between regular gun and something bigger.
